1504840.name: Surprising My Neighbors 2
1504840.description:
Surprising My Neighbors 2 – a first-person game where you will be leaving your surprises at the doors of your favorite neighbors. You moved to a new city a year ago. One morning, you went outside and found poop at your door again. It looks like someone of your new neighbors left it there. But you don’t know who exactly did it, so you will have to give your present to each of them.



Be careful, for it’s not something they might like when they find poop at their doors.
Your task is to come up to your neighbors’ houses and leave your poop at their doors. Just as you do so, the owner of the house will run after you. The more neighbors are running after you, the harder it will be to escape from them.
1504840.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 日语
